A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was disappointing if you are a Star Wars fan.  If there had never been another Star Wars movie it would be a good movie\, but I didn't like the direction they took.  I feel like Disney just disrespected every fan who grew up loving these characters.  I think the fan backlash shows that the writers and director didn't truly think about the fans when developing this movie.  There is a hole in the plot and a hole in my heart.
